description: Leading backend development for India's largest job portal, focusing on scalable microservices architecture. Worked on critical modules including recruiter search, profile management, and payment systems handling millions of daily requests.
achievements: Architected and developed Resdex module for recruiter search and profile bookmarking
Built config-based multi-gateway payment service handling high transaction volumes
Optimized database queries and caching strategies, improving response times by 40%
Mentored junior developers and established coding standards for the team

description: Developed backend systems for subscription management and licensing servers. Built RESTful APIs, implemented payment gateways, and designed database schemas for scalable applications.
achievements: Developed subscription service with recruiter plans and access control
Built time-based licensing server with tamper protection mechanisms
Reduced API response times through caching and query optimization
